component.name: listDeals
component.description: Retrieves collection of deals which belongs to a user.

component.name: getDealNotes
component.description: Retrieves a list of notes of a specific deal.

component.name: createDealNote
component.description: Creates a new note for a specific deal.

component.name: getDealReminders
component.description: Retrieves a list of reminders of a specific deal.

component.name: createDealReminder
component.description: Creates a new reminder for a specific deal.
